exceptions.exn: In environment factorial_cancel : forall n a b : nat, fact n * a = fact n * b -> a = b p : nat Hp : p <> 0 expo_p_cancel : forall n a b : nat, expo n p * a = expo n p * b -> a = b i, n : nat Unable to unify "?M1443 = ?M1444" with "〚 mprod_an (i * p + 1) n 〛 = 〚 fact n 〛".
Found no subterm matching "Π ?M1442 (fun i : nat => i + 1)" in the current goal.
The reference mprod_an_morphism was not found in the current environment.

original: apply factorial_cancel with (n := n). rewrite <- mprod_factorial. symmetry. apply mprod_an_morphism. intros i. apply plus_cancel_l. rewrite <- mprod_an_plus. rewrite <- msum_an_formula. rewrite binomial_thm. rewrite mult_assoc. reflexivity.
